participant_1.background:
I currently rent my home.
I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people.
i sleep in late during the day.
I love to go for long runs in the park, even when the weather is unpredictable.
i really like watching star trek.

participant_2.background:
I often spend hours researching vintage cars online.
I frequently drink chocolate milk, which is not very good for my weight.
I enjoy the quiet solitude of my life on the farm.
some jokes go too far.
I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.

content.text: Hi, I am doing well! How are you?
I am doing well too, thanks for asking.
That's good to hear. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy watching Star Trek, running, and doing odd jobs for people.
Oh, I like Star Trek too! What's your favorite series?
My favorite series is Deep Space Nine. I love the characters and the story lines.
I've never seen Deep Space Nine, but I've heard good things about it.
You should check it out sometime! It's a great show.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy researching vintage cars online, playing the piano, and spending time on my farm.
That sounds like fun. I've never been on a farm before.
You should come visit mine sometime! I have a lot of animals, and it's a great place to relax.
Great! I'll give you my address
